post:
AlphaVPS – Dedicated servers from €25

August 7, 2017 @ 10:29 am, by Matt Zelasko

Hello everyone! Aleksander from AlphaVPS has sent in an offer for some nicely priced dedicated servers and we’re happy to pass them along.

Here’s what he had to say: 

“AlphaVPS is a part of DA International Group Ltd. and is operational since 2013. We’re a company, registered in Bulgaria, EU (202826767). We operate out of our office in Troyan and are fully staffed inhouse, offering 24/7/365 support via tickets, emails and live chat / phone, during EU business hours. Our range of services include a big variety of IT services out of 5 PoPs. We operate AS203380 and the hardware we utilize in BG is fully owned by us.”

Their WHOIS is public and you can find their ToS/Legal docs here. They accept PayPal, Credit Cards, Bitcoins, and Bank wire as method of payment.

The deals: 

4G-OVZ
– 4GB Dedicated RAM
– 30GB SSD
– 1TB Bandwith
– 4 Shared CPU Cores
– 1gbps Port
– 1 IPv4 IP
– OpenVZ
– /64 of IPv6
– UK or BG or DE or NY or LA
– 5EUR per month, recurring
[ORDER NOW]

NETWORK INFO:

We utilize different kind of harware across the locations. We utilize a range of E3 and E5 server nodes with blazing fast SSD RAID protected arrays for OpenVZ and big HDD arrays for KVM offerings. Our commitment is to keep all the hardware up to date and offer outstanding performance to our clients.
